Reviews.Content: surprised visited baglioni first time last year 25th wedding anniversary visit florence accompanied three kids remembered fabulous view superb service wonderful food time different disappointing lovely wonderful view restaurant empty almost atmosphere little depressing ordered assured food would least good speaking wasnt bad contained one cheese menu happened chose sauce main course consisted grand total whole three us feast salad guess chips american nothing else impressed bill returning baglioni
